text: Luhansk Oblast () is an oblast (province) of eastern Ukraine. The administrative centre is Luhansk. The population of Luhansk Oblast was 2,233,000 in 2014. ==Administrative divisions== * Alchevsk Raion **Alchevsk (hromada) ** Kadiivka ** Zymohiria * Dovzhansk Raion ** Dovzhansk ** Sorokyne * Luhansk ** Luhansk ** Lutuhyne ** Molodohvardiisk * Rovenky ** Antratsyt ** Khrustalnyi ** Rovenky * Shchastia ** Nyzhnioteple ** Novoaidar ** Shchastia ** Shyrokyi ** Stanytsia Luhanska * Sievierodonetsk ** Hirske ** Kreminna ** Lysychansk ** Popasna ** Rubizhne ** Sievierodonetsk * Starobilsk ** Bilovodsk ** Bilolutsk ** Chmyrivka ** Markivka ** Milove ** Novopskov ** Shulhynka ** Starobilsk * Svatove ** Bilokurakyne ** Kolomyichykha ** Krasnorichenske ** Lozno-Oleksandrivka ** Nyzhnia Duvanka ** Svatove ** Troitske ==References==
title: Luhansk Oblast
